overview: Rubber Ducky: She loves her rubber ducky. The way it keeps her company in the tub. But suddenly it was gone and in its place arose a monster rubber ducky from the suds. And look at that hard cock!  Don't Go Near the Basement: Something was in the basement. She knew she heard something. She wasn't crazy. No matter what her husband said. Then one night it happened. It climbed up under the covers right up to her crotch.  Mummy Dearest: In ancient Egypt, royalty would be mummified for the afterlife when they died. Often times these tombs would have the threat of horrible curses if someone were to disturb it. A young intern at a museum will discover just how real this curse is as she experiences the sins of the mummy!  Boiling the Meat: Enter the shocking world of serial killers as we visit the infamous Jeffrey Dahmer cooking up a snack in his kitchen. View for yourself one of the ones that got away alive ... but not without a good ass fucking.
title: Perverted Stories 24
